comment: Extremely easy class. There are several big assignments, but she guides you through each one and is extremely helpful. Shes also super nice and so far the best professor Ive had.

She is hands down the best professor Ive ever had. She makes her assignment enjoyable to do that it doesnt even feel like it school work. She amazing when it comes to feedback and how to help you become better in the subject. Trust me when i say to take her class

She is such a sweet person who genuinely cares about her students. I absolutely loved her because she was so chill about late work. Very understanding and attendance was taken but didn't really matter. Each assignment was clear and she gives the opportunity to redo it if you don't do well. Wish I could take her again.
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: I was lucky to have her! By far one of the easiest and most fun classes. Dr. Aughey is very caring, funny, and will reply to emails immediately with extensions to papers/tests. Her class is graded by a total of 1000 points, so just do all of her main assignments and it's an easy A. You really grow your creative side with what you do in this class.

TAKE THIS CLASS! She's amazing, caring, and funny. The only professor I've had that took into account the times we're in. Assignments are fun because you're given creative freedom. Generous grader, I got 100's on every assignment except one and one test (which were 95's). Take this class!!!!!! It's fun and not a burden!
Dr. Aughey was such a great professor! There were only two tests and they were very easy. She explained how to do assignments very well and was very flexible with late work. Really recommend!

Professor Aughey is very understanding considering everything that is going on. She runs her class based on points by assignment, she is a fair grader and gives great feed back. The work load is not over whelming and she is willing to help you if you have a problem. There were only 2 test they were exceptionally easy; clear directions.  (1101)
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Great lady and very passionate about what she teaches. 1102 is research heavy so you just write a research paper but she's also willing to help out with it. Also, classes are great since she can sometimes get off topic but it's great conversations.

Dr. Aughey is very engaging and does not shy away from difficult, but relevant topics and leans into the uncomfortable. You are free to speak your mind in her class. She was not very good with D2L (online platform), but other than that I would take her class over and over!
She is the most sweetest professor. I recommend everybody take her. She made the assignments fun. If you take your time with the assignments her class is an easy A. Had so much fun in this class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Caring

comment: Dr. Aughey is the best English teacher there is! If her class is available, take it. She is understanding and allows for late work at the end of the semester to improve your grade. She is caring and respectful. I had her for a meet two days a week class, and 80% of the time we only met once a week and had a "lab day" to give us time to finish work.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria
